text: Viśvāsigaḷē, nīvu allāhana sahāyakarāgiri – maryamara putra īsā tam'ma āpta śiṣyaroḍane ‘‘allāhana mārgadalli nanage neravāguvavaru yāriddāre?’’ Endante. Avara āpta śiṣyaru ‘‘nāvu allāhana sahāyakaru’’ endaru. Ā baḷika isrā'īlara santatiyallina ondu gumpu viśvāsaviṭṭitu mattu innondu gumpu dhikkarisitu. Nāvu viśvāsigaḷige avara śatrugaḷa virudda neravu odagisidevu mattu avaru vijayigaḷādaru
